website_summaries.verdict: Simple entryway bench that delivers an impressive functionality with narrow frame.
pros: At only 12 inches in width and 18 inches in height, this bench fits perfectly in a small entryway
Contains two rack shelves underneath the sitting area for shoes or a briefcase
Metal seat is more comfortable than you might think
Good performance level, as bench supports up to 440 pounds
cons: May be too short for some

customer_reviews.title: Just put this together and was a little disappointed especially since the reviews were so great
customer_reviews.text: Just put this together and was a little disappointed especially since the reviews were so great. Two of the legs were scratched up, the upholstery was puckered and the stitching wasn't the greatest. Other than that it's sturdy, looks nice and fulfills its purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Kristine

customer_reviews.title: Waste of Time and Money
customer_reviews.text: I have assembled many pieces of furniture in my lifetime. But this is the first one I was unable to finish. I attempted several times and even took a long break in between attempts to calm down. This should be simple, but it wasnt. The screws DO NOT line up with the holes. There is absolutely no way for me to properly assemble this piece of garbage without buying a drill and drilling new holes that actually line up. Huge waste of time and money.
customer_reviews.author: Nicki

customer_reviews.title: Love love love it
customer_reviews.text: Love love love it, if you notice if you enlarge the picture there's a sign that I got off of Amazon that says please remove your shoes and a basket I also purchased through Amazon and the slippers and the rug I also purchased through Amazon . Love it all
customer_reviews.author: denise bisogni

customer_reviews.title: This bench has been AWESOME! We can place about 8 pairs of shoes ...
customer_reviews.text: This was placed in our foyer since our shoes seem to pile up by the front door. This bench has been AWESOME! We can place about 8 pairs of shoes on the 2 racks and makes tidying up a breeze. It was super easy to assemble. I'll sit on it and put my shoes on and it's not too low to the ground and is comfortable for the 30 seconds I need to sit. Definitely recommend for a place to store your shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Great Entryway Bench
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bench / shoe rack for the entryway. It has a beautiful, modern, sturdy design. The bench was easy to assemble and is worth the price. It holds 6 pairs of size 12 men's shoes / boots.
customer_reviews.author: Parker Shearer

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and super-easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: This is quite a sturdy little bench. It's not terribly comfortable to sit on, but as you're not going to be spending all day on it, that shouldn't be an issue. I couldn't find the instructions, so I assembled it without them on intuition alone, and didn't have any problems with that, so I think it's safe to say assembly is a breeze. (I later found the instructions had slipped under the packing debris during my enthusiastic unboxing celebration. Oh well... I didn't need them anyway!)
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Baiocchi

customer_reviews.title: Totally Exceeded Expectations
customer_reviews.text: Ours has successfully survived nine months holding various shoes and coats, not to mention myself as I've been putting on my shoes. I've been pleasantly surprised by our Amazon furniture decision, and we've shared with several friends where we got it. Several people have asked! Flip-flops, flats, and slippers fit below the first shoe shelf and the shelves fit heels, wedges, and ankle boots. I recommend keeping a small waterproof mat to the side of the bench for snow boots or other shoes that won't fit on the bench. It's easy and quick to put together. The color matches easily and it's a great size. If you're going back and forth on this, I'd recommend trying it!
customer_reviews.author: Mackenzie

customer_reviews.title: Functional, sturdy, clean lines.
customer_reviews.text: As indicated, the bench was very easy to get together, it seems sturdy. I say “seems” because it is still brand new. However, I’m a relatively heavy guy, and it holds me and several pairs of shoes and boots. The bench is a perfect size for it’s intended use. It’s in a narrow hall in a small apartment. I live in a rainy area and it’s perfect for getting out of wet shoes coming in. Very pleased so far.
customer_reviews.author: SteveB

customer_reviews.title: Easy Assembly and Great Looking
customer_reviews.text: The packaging of the shoe bench was fairly good! There are a few small pieces of metal rambling inside of the shafts, but otherwise impressive overall. The welding marks (see pictures) is a little ugly, but it's in a spot where you'll barely notice this. Assembly took me maybe 20 minutes, but I was going slow. The directions, although short and jammed, were understandable. I can see a scatter-minded builder getting frustrated though. Overall quality of the material is great. The cushion is a bit on the firm side, but the foam gives after a second or two of sitting on it. My only fear is the cushion breaking down quickly, but only time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: Tay Tomal

customer_reviews.title: it looks super cute and stylish
customer_reviews.text: I am currently writing this review whilst sitting on this very shoe rack bench and can only say the most positive things from the bottom of my butt. First of all, it looks super cute and stylish, well-tailored and durable looking. Second, it was braid-dead easy to put together and the instructions were simple. Third, it's really durable. It's far from wobbly or creaky or smelly or heavy. I love it so much that when my sofa comes in a few days, you can bet my buss will still have raving reviews about this bench. Get. It.
customer_reviews.author: Steven H

customer_reviews.title: really wanted to like and keep this
customer_reviews.text: I really, really, really wanted to like and keep this. It appears well made except for the fact that it is not totally level so it rocks a bit. I ended up returning it. I tried to loosen screws, tighten screws, etc. I assembled it exactly as described, which entails not tightening all the screws until the top is fully screwed on. Interestingly, when I pulled it apart I noticed all the legs are the same length, so I don't know why it did that. Loved it but couldn't live with the rocking.
customer_reviews.author: st usa

customer_reviews.title: I really like this thing!
customer_reviews.text: I have a space in my back entry area that's perfect for a bench this size, so I had been considering a number of the ones here on Amazon. This turned out to be a great purchase, value-wise and overall. It was very easy to assemble, all of the parts were included, and I'd say the quality out of the box was A+ for the money. It holds SIX pair of my shoes (men's size 10), and the seat is comfortable and resilient. It looks like a much more expensive product. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: D.M.

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: It's sturdy and easy to assemble. The only thing I don't like is.. So you know how when you sit on some pleather coated memory foam and the pleather has a loose butt impact wrinkle when you get up? That happened upon first sit by my slightly under 50 lbs child. It has managed to puff back up and fill itself in but it took awhile.. And with each sit, it happens again. And we're not talking about long lengthy sits.. Just long enough to put on some shoes or skates.
customer_reviews.author: Darshling

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable affordable Seating
customer_reviews.text: We were looking for a bench seat that wasn't wood and had good padding. We shopped at a big local retailer and couldn't find the right look, style, features, construction, etc. We found this bench seat to be good size, made of strong metal, really good padding and for a decent price. We purchased three as we needed one for a couple of bedrooms and the mudroom/foyer. We are very satisfied with the purchase. Easy to keep clean faux padding material and several pairs of boots/shoes can be stored on the shelves.
customer_reviews.author: Scotty

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!  Excellent Product!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Product! Exactly as stated! Love it Love it! I'm so happy with my purchase and it fits beautifully in the foyer area. So now not only can you put your shoes AWAY but have a place to sit as well. I love dual purpose items. I have two ottomans that are leather and not only can you sit on them but you can store stuff away in them as well. It keeps the home organized with pieces that can do multiple things. Also, my boyfriend put it together in 15 minutes! Easy to put together! A very functional, sturdy piece of furniture and it looks very nice as well!
customer_reviews.author: Patty M.

customer_reviews.title: Suprisingly sturdy, but takes time to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: Firstly, I really like this bench, it is a great value & sturdier than I expected. The legs and rungs are heavy and thick. The color perfectly matched my other furniture, and the bench is comfortable. I did experience problems with assembly; I have built MANY an Allen key project, and the key provided offers little leverage. The screws and pre-drilled holes were not misaligned, but some of the screws refused to latch properly for some time. It was a frustrating 40ish minute project, that should've taken 15. Additionally, my bench arrived with a small tear, that is about a 1⁄2 inch long (pictured) on one side (I turned that side to the wall).
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia L. Benjamin

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as an entryway bench for people to walk in, sit, and remove their shoes. It didn't take long to arrive... maybe 4 days. A little difficult to put together and the directions weren't the best, but I do like it very much. It's very strong and can easily support my husband who is around 275 lbs. The cushion is very squishy and the bench can hold about 6 pairs of adult shoes. Can't speak on durability, but I'm hoping this lasts a while.
customer_reviews.author: bri93

customer_reviews.title: Great bench for the price. Ignored minor damage.
customer_reviews.text: As I unpacked the bench, I checked each piece and was pleased with the quality. There was a slight bend (closer to a dent) in one rail of one of the shelves. I didn't think it was enough to affect the bench structurally, so I just put that side towards the wall. The bench cushion looks perfect. My husband (270 lbs) was able to sit and wiggle on the bench while putting on his shoes and the bench felt sturdy. *We still have shoes sitting by the door about 4 feet away, but we are making progress!
customer_reviews.author: K M.

customer_reviews.title: Game Changer!!! Putting on shoes in comfort! Looks neat!
customer_reviews.text: We assembled this bench in about 10 minutes. Very easy, straight forward instructions. We love how it looks and it feels sturdy and good quality. We didn’t install the lower shelf so that we can store boots and higher top shoes on the bottom on our shoe mat. Exactly what we were looking for! We love it! Two people can sit on it at the same time comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: S. King

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful solution to a messy problem
customer_reviews.text: We had an area in our home where shoes would collect on a boot tray. It would be inconvenient sometimes to put our shoes on and was messy. After looking at several benches with shoe storage, I chose this one. It was a little bit more expensive than another choice but I am so glad I chose this one. The bench is comfortable; at least 8 pairs of shoes fit on the shelves and the boot tray fits under it to catch drips from snow and rain). Wonderful solution to our problem area!
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: This is a very sturdy bench and attractive price
customer_reviews.text: The assembly took me less than one hour. Be careful that you don’t drop or lose any of the screws, because there are no extras. The screws are two different sizes. The longer four are for attaching the top only. A ratchet or power screw driver will help in assembly. The little wrench provided with the bench will frustrate you and make assembly more difficult..
customer_reviews.author: C. F. Crowe

customer_reviews.title: Defective - not aligned in several places
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of this bench but as you can see it arrived with a damaged piece. The bar is on an angle and the tip was smashed on on of the legs of that same piece. Further, the seat holes are not aligned with the base but maybe that would be rectified if the defective side bar piece were replaced. I contacted the seller with hopes this can be resolved. Again, it's a really nice looking piece and I'll be really disappointed if these issues cannot be resolved. Please do a better job with quality control.
customer_reviews.author: GB

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: Loved it but I did away with the top and put on butcher block and painted it.
customer_reviews.author: MAX

customer_reviews.title: More than what I expected
customer_reviews.text: Considering the price of the item, I was reluctant to buy it because I was afraid of the quality. Anyways I bought it and I don't regret it. It is sturdy, very simple to assemble and works great with my furniture. Simple and clean look
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy bench.
customer_reviews.text: Liked this bench a lot. Sturdy enough to hold my husbands 250#s. I did have some difficulty assembling. Some of the holes didn't line up exactly with the bolt threads even though I didn't tighten the bolts completely while assembling. From experience you should always go from one bolt to the next tightening each a little at a time. It might have been a little easier if I had another person holding some of the parts but I did get through it. I would recommend this bench to friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: Granny's Purse

customer_reviews.title: Good value and very useful
customer_reviews.text: Housemate and I discussed entry bench concept before making purchase and placing near entry door. Good aid in organizing outdoor footwear which is not worn indoors, helps immensely in putting on and removing shoes, helps minimize tracking dirt/debris throughout the interior and offers a transition rest station between coming in from the outdoors and the following inside activity.
customer_reviews.author: p griffin

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking inexpensive bench for shoe storage/sitting
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a small entry bench to store shores in and to sit on, that wasn't crazy expensive as it is only used a few times a day for a few minutes... This little guy totally fits the bill and it looks very nice with the black iron legs and faux leather seat. I can store 3 adult sized shoes on each rack. The seat is steady and is not wobbly. Had a couple of difficulties of putting it together as some of the holes on the seat did not line up with the frame so I took it mostly apart and started with the seat first and had a much easier time putting it together.
customer_reviews.author: Saber Roulette

customer_reviews.title: Very nice & sturdy bench for a good price
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my bedroom so I can have a place to sit while getting dressed. To those who ask if the bench is sturdy, I weigh north of 250 and I have no problem sitting on it with all my weight. In fact, I wouldn't hesitate to stand on it for a short time. It took me about 5 minutes to put together. It's not going to win any good housekeeping design awards, but it's very functional for what I thought was a very fair price.
customer_reviews.author: DW

customer_reviews.title: Great mud room bench.
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to put together and it looks nice enough for our mud room. Since we wanted to put our outside boots/shoes on it we wound up taking off the middle rack as they were too tall to fit underneath. Removing the middle rack has not affected the stability of the bench. If all you are catching are sneakers - both racks would work great.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Size and Function For Bathroom
customer_reviews.text: We just got this black "Shoe Bench" to complete our new bathroom remodel. Not only is it attractive and sturdy, but it is the perfect size- not too big and not too small- the best one we could find. It gives us a much needed place to sit, change shoes and also to store towels underneath. It's just like it was made for us! So far, I would highly recommend this bench. Once we get our hardwood floors refinished, we will buy another one for our entry.
customer_reviews.author: John Packard

customer_reviews.title: Great, sturdy shoe bench
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe rack and bench for small areas! The cushion has a strong odor out of the box, but I'm sure that it will dissipate over time. I also had one extremely stubborn screw that won't go in no matter how I position the cushion or loosen and tighten the other screws. Otherwise, it's exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: R. Ash

customer_reviews.title: Would make a great gift
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the small space we have behind our sectional as you come in or out of home. We had just a shoe rack there before but was alway cluttered and fell apart often, this shoe bench is sturdy thicker metal than I thought it’d be and perfect to sit and get ready for work. Thinking about these as gifts for family at Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Mariah Miller

customer_reviews.title: Looks like the picture
customer_reviews.text: Lovely bench. Looks like the picture. Doesn't take up much space. I weight 150 and careful when I sit to not move around but the bench feels a little weak (wigglely) even though I used tools to tighten screws during assembly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ok for the price
customer_reviews.text: I like this bench. It was simple to put together and looks nice. Minor damage to metal. Also random blemish on the metal that bothers me. However I mostly dislike the brown faux leather it is a very red shade of brown. I bought to match my brown leather couch in the room but unfortunately it is very different shade of brown. However for the price and purpose of this I am satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product for the price. Was a perfect fit for our entryway. Rack arrived on time and was well packed. Easy to put together, and is far more sturdy than I had expected. Looks great. Would be easy to "dress up" by replacing the faux leather seat with material, if you're so inclined.
customer_reviews.author: dmwalker

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Putting this together was very quick and very simple. It is very sturdy and I haven't had any issues with it what-so-ever. It does not look cheap and it seems to hold up under a good amount of weight from multiple people (over 200 lbs).
customer_reviews.author: Michael Kilroy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value and functionality
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble requiring no tools outside of what was in the package. Very quick and easy to assemble, comfortable bench that is perfect for taking off shoes at the door then stowing them out of the way on it's shelves. Fits nicely in a small area and sturdy enough to hold us bigger folks.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Parker

customer_reviews.title: I like how it can be easily wiped clean
customer_reviews.text: I use this in my garage for shoes as we go in and out of the house. I can fit 4 pairs of my size 9 shoes on the top rack and my husband fits 3 pairs of his size 12 shoes on the bottom. I like how it can be easily wiped clean. It's sturdy but doesn't look ugly or industrial. Perfect for my needs. It was quick to put together too. My husband did it quickly with our crazy 2-year old dancing around him.
customer_reviews.author: tinaamber

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, works great
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 of these at the entrance of my house. People can sit and put on their shoes, or they can just sit down for a minute if they want to. My only complaint is that it doesn't store that many shoes, but that's fine - the rest of our less used shoes are in the garage instead.
customer_reviews.author: Zerkium

customer_reviews.title: Worth it but might have wobble issues.
customer_reviews.text: This does what it needs to do and does it well. I almost removed a star because there are no instructions although it was easy enough to figure out. However once assembled, there appeared to be a wobble. After moving some of the bars around and such I was able to reduce but not eliminate this wobble. However, after putting it where I wanted it and sitting on it a few times, this wobble has vanished. I've had this for almost 3 months now and since the wobble has vanished, I've had no complaints at all.
customer_reviews.author: Mundokiir

customer_reviews.title: Easy assemble, fair price
customer_reviews.text: You know how you read reviews and wonder if they're real people or paid... Well I'm real and I bought this. Was unsure because of the reviews but I like it and it was super easy to assemble I did it myself and im not the brightest light bulb in the box, so if I can do it you can too. I would sit more than 250lbs on it but its sturdy enough for the price
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Welds broke during assembly
customer_reviews.text: The welds broke while putting the very first part together. The part that holds the screw in 2 of the support bars completely came out of the bar. We can pull the bar right out in pic 1. Can still use for shoes but won't use to sit. Once put together seems sturdier. Try assembling from bottom up to avoid this issue. Looks nice.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good purchase
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. One of the screws included was defective and the wrench wouldn’t fit it but other than that it was easy to assemble. Felt like it only took 15 minutes but maybe longer with the bad screw. It’s a nice addition to my mud room.
customer_reviews.author: JL

customer_reviews.title: Functions exactly as expected
customer_reviews.text: This was a perfect fit in a weird little area by our garage door entry. It took very little time to assemble and feels very sturdy. Could hold 8 pairs of womens sneakers, but 6 max for men's shoes. It's not fancy and I wouldn't expect any compliments on it ever, but overall it's what I thought it would be and I am pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kelliar

customer_reviews.title: The bench was wobbly when I put it together and it has only gotten worse. On the plus side the product looks just ...
customer_reviews.text: I have had this bench for a year now and I am afraid to sit on it to put on my shoes. The bench was wobbly when I put it together and it has only gotten worse. On the plus side the product looks just as it did when new but I wanted a bench, not just a rack. I am going to go with an all wood one next.
customer_reviews.author: Robert H.

customer_reviews.title: do not do it
customer_reviews.text: can only fit shoes between shelves- not boots screws did not line up so assembly was impossible addendum: company really cared. They sent another and it worked out fine.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila Swartz

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and feels sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! We bought two and it looks nice, is the perfect height to sit on and stores all of our winter shoes perfectly as the snow falls between the metal shelves underneath into a rug. Shelves aren’t tall enough for snow boots FYI but not a problem for us.
customer_reviews.author: Morty

customer_reviews.title: Nicely Compact Size, But Level to Unlevel After First Use
customer_reviews.text: Easy to construct, seemed heavy-weight for the price. Was pleased to finally find a bench narrow enough for my space by the door. After constructing, the bench was initially level. HOWEVER, after sitting on it (125 pounds), one leg is now UNLEVEL by 1/2", even though the screw are tight.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer-Hidden Jewel

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Good quality for the price. Easy install - nice to keep a few pair of shoes by the entry-way and bench is comfortable to sit down for a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Omar

customer_reviews.title: Well done/ Good seating.
customer_reviews.text: Served needs well for a smaller entry area. -Sturdy/ sleek/ basic- clean lines. -Comfortable enough to sit on - matched other black faux leather & leather in area - would buy again
customer_reviews.author: A. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Pratical New Kitty Perch!
customer_reviews.text: After noticing my shoes piling in my entry way, I decided to purchase this shoe bench. Assembly was easy peesy, I have a place for my shoes and a place to sit while I put my shoes on. Also, my cat seems to dig it too as a new place to perch. It's a little wobbly and seems cheaply produced, so it probably is overpriced, but not enough to bug me. It serves my needs nicely so I'm satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Some-Lady-Who-Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Nice Looking Easy to Assemble
customer_reviews.text: Nice product, no isses, but it is smaller than I had imagined. We didn't need a lot bigger for the space but you really wouldn't have two adults sitting on it removing shoes at the same time. Just too little.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Marie Patrin

customer_reviews.title: this is a very good product I like it a lot
customer_reviews.text: Ok, this is a very good product I like it a lot, very sturdy, very water resistant, sleek &clean the I like it. The only thing the second one I ordered came with a slightly thicker cushion then the first one,no big deal it's working for me.
customer_reviews.author: mell

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: I have really loved this bench. We put it in our small entryway two months ago, and has been so helpful corralling our shoes and keeping the are tidy. Also the faux leather looks very high quality. It took me, maaaaayybe 15 minutes to assemble? The only tip I would have is to keep the screws relatively loose until everything is assembled. The holes are larger than the screws, so if you fasten them tightly at the beginning you could end up not being able to assemble later parts since the holes could be slightly off. Love!
customer_reviews.author: Madison Allred

customer_reviews.title: Perfect little foyer bench
customer_reviews.text: I bought the black cushion one for my sister's foyer in her new townhome. It's a perfect little bench for her entrance way. with shoe racks that will fit up to 6-8 pairs of shoes. It took me about 10 min to put together - super easy. I liked it so much I told my other sister that I would buy one for her, too... but, when I went to her house, she had the EXACT same one in the other color!
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: Perfect at the door
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to go by our back door. It works perfect, come in, sit down and take your work shoes off. Easy to put together, I did it by myself, arrived quickly and great price.
customer_reviews.author: Mountain Love

customer_reviews.title: I thought it was going to be a bit longer ...
customer_reviews.text: I thought it was going to be a bit longer, but works well! holds three pairs of shoes across the shelves.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Downs

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.text: Great bench, very sturdy. We got the two tone black and brown, and it matches really well. It's also narrow enough to fit in a normal sized hallway with plenty of space to sit and still move through easily. The racks beneath are also very convenient for holding shoes - you can fit about three pairs of men shoes per rack. Would recommend this to anyone looking for a small bench for entryway.
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased!
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was great for the price! Just what I needed. Put it right inside the front door. Fits perfectly in small space. Kids use for shoes and sit on it while waiting for bus time. It’s fine for average sized adult to sit on. Did NOT bend as stated in some reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works and looks nice we just wish it didn't have that defect
customer_reviews.text: We did everything my the book and more and one leg still came out crooked. It works and looks nice we just wish it didn't have that defect.
customer_reviews.author: Maribel

customer_reviews.title: GOOD
customer_reviews.text: Evaluation was late a few days, the table is very good still, fold up very convenient when need not, do not take a place, suit the family with small area in the room particularly, desktop board thickness is about 1.5 centimeters, not peculiar smell, the knob that table leg has adjust height below, can adjust oneself according to the circumstance. The table had better not put anything too heavy in it to prevent damage.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good idea, good buy
customer_reviews.text: I really like the way it looks and stopped my boy's shoes from being all over the livingroom,BUT it's not heavy so moves easily on wood floors Easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Great entryway shoe bench
customer_reviews.text: I have this bench in my entryway and I think it is a great fit. It was easy to assemble. My roommate and I and guests can store our shoes as we come in. The cushion isn't like sit there for hours comfortable but who would do that.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: It's a bench for putting stuff on your feet that doesn't cost an arm and a leg
customer_reviews.text: Went together easy enough. Has some wobble thanks to uneven legs. Wondering how long this is going to last — it's easy to overtighten the bolts and deform the tubing.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: plenty good enough
customer_reviews.text: Not the sturdiest item I would classify as furniture, but it fits the role. It's sturdy enough to accommodate two people at once, and that's all we really needed from it.
customer_reviews.author: gtadem

customer_reviews.title: Instructions not included
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size and appearance for what I wanted. I would rate 5 stars but it didn’t come with instructions or mention that it won’t come with any. Tried looking them up and couldn’t find anything.
customer_reviews.author: KristenC

customer_reviews.title: Good Bench For the Price
customer_reviews.text: I am using this bench in a reception area of a youth respite center and it is very nice. I bought two of them and the other is in a hallway. They look nice, easy to assemble and very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Jill Seitz

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble and sturdy enough
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to assemble. Fit right where I needed it too. But instead of holding shoes as intended we put mail and random stuff on it. But it would be perfect to sit and put on shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Annalisa

customer_reviews.title: Accurate descriptions
customer_reviews.text: I like this bench. You get just what's described. I wish it was a little taller. It's a bit of a drop for thoes of us with a little snow on our top.
customer_reviews.author: anna

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted.
customer_reviews.text: Sturty and simple to put together. Soo comfortable and it looks really nice
customer_reviews.author: Vianney132

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble, very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy with this product. We put it together within 15 minutes. It's super sturdy and fits exactly how I imagined in my mudroom. A great place to come in, sit, and take off the shoes! Even my 6'3" fella sat very comfortably on it. Not wobbly. Yay! Another successful Amazon purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Lynette

customer_reviews.title: Great alternative for workout bench
customer_reviews.text: I was looking at workout benches but I have a very tiny amount of space for a home gym. This is the perfect alternative as the cushion is one long seem (no metal bars like some other storage benches) and sturdy enough to do arm dips off of. It holds my weights on the bottom shelf (which prevent tippage while using the bench) and some containers on the top for towels/ arm bands/ etc.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsey Forry

customer_reviews.title: Screws come loose
customer_reviews.text: I did not measure the height I needed before I ordered and it turned out to be a bit too high (my fault). Although this bench felt plenty sturdy when we first put it together it has become quite loose (not my fault). I'll need to tighten it up every few weeks or end up on the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Mary K. Crowley

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Love this shoe bench. I would say depending on size it fits 3 to 4 pairs of shoes on each shelf underneath which works perfect for us. Its very sturdy and not as small as I thought it might be.
customer_reviews.author: Katrina Cordell

customer_reviews.title: Nice bench
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and sturdy. Didn’t come with instructions reason for four stars. But was able to figure it out. Good buy for me!
customer_reviews.author: JazzyGrand

customer_reviews.title: Great looking & confortable bench/shoe rack
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little bench/shoe rack!! My son wanted something small where he could keep his shoes in his bedroom. We put this on the one side of his bed and his bedroom door was on the other side. It has worked out perfectly. He can either grab a pair of shoes on his way of his bedroom or actually sit down on the nicely cushioned bench to put the shoes on before heading out. I really like the fact that it looks like a piece of furniture in his room rather than a shelving system.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So useful
customer_reviews.text: Was a bit challenging to put together alone, but it's held up through several moves. Love having it in my entry.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Adams

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Wanted a solid bench. Lists the weight rating. Very sturdy and stylish. Nice bonded leather seat with thick cushion. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: SAMIAM

customer_reviews.title: Good basic bench for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great for the price. Easy to assemble. Looks almost as nice as the pictures. We left the bottom rack off so we could kick shoes under it directly on the floor of our entryway and have a little more room for boots. Fits 3 pairs under and three more on the top rack. Nice to have a place to sit for guests to put their shoes back on.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Austin

customer_reviews.title: This was a fantastic purchase. The height of this bench is perfect ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a fantastic purchase. The height of this bench is perfect for individuals who may have difficulties with low furniture, and the length of the bench is long enough to allow two people at one time to sit down. This bench is also able to hold up to 400 lbs (181 kg).
customer_reviews.author: By His Mercy

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: Pros : comfy seat ! Pretty solid bench for the price. Nice leather look. Doesn’t take up to much space. Cons : Less then 7” between shoe racks, not useful for boots.( I removed the middle shelf so my boots would fit) You will need some sort of easily removable mat to catch the dirt that drops through the open rings of the bottom shelf.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Roberts

customer_reviews.title: solid, good looking and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: perfect for our small entry way to remove or put on our shoes - plus the two storage shelves keep the shoes off the floor. easy to assemble, great color and they claim it will hold several hundred pounds -- prompt delivery and efficient, compact packaging
customer_reviews.author: MsP

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice, meh quality
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, love that it's narrow, as it's in a pretty narrow hallway next to our front door. The materials are pretty cheap, felt like I was going to crack the screw if I tightened it as much as I wanted, but it's sturdy enough to sit on and hold shoes and looks nice enough!
customer_reviews.author: Rocio Crabb

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: I am quite pleased with my purchase. It was easy to assemble and seems really sturdy compared to one I had before that was made of wood that just came apart when a large person sat on it.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Y.

customer_reviews.title: Uneven Bench?
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited to order this bench for my entrance way so my mom and dad have a place to sit and remove their shoes when they come visit me. The color is perfect and the bench is comfortable to sit on. The reason for the 2 stars is my product delivered uneven. It doesn’t sit flat on my wooden floor. I’m very disappointed in the quality of the product I received.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty much what I had expected
customer_reviews.text: Pretty much what I had expected. As mentioned in the instructions (for those who do not follow them :) ), do not fully screw in the screws until all the parts are connected. It was difficult to get some of the holes lined up to get the screws to line up straight and needed to put some force to hold it all together and make it fit. Otherwise, once put together, useful product especially for the price point.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This thing is great
customer_reviews.text: So easy to build, sturdy, looks good, comfortable seat, functional and holds six pair of shoes. Cool beaners.
customer_reviews.author: joe aversano

customer_reviews.title: Nice Bench
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together and looks much more expensive than it was. It is in my foyer and I get compliments often.
customer_reviews.author: JKC

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Build, but cushion is kind of hard.
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery with prime. Sturdy build overall with all screws & needed tool in one package. Cushion is kind of hard & it is smaller than I thought, ok if you have a small space.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good bench
customer_reviews.text: Durable, cute, fits two adults comfortably, fits 2 teens comfortably and at least 10 pair of shoes adult size.
customer_reviews.author: Ky

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Shoe Storage Bench for the Price!
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price! This bench is exactly what i was looking for. It is sturdy, the cushion is comfortable, and it fits perfectly in my front doorway. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Patrick B

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, sleek look
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely perfect for our back door entryway. Nice amount of padding and sturdy construction.
customer_reviews.author: Irene

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and nice width
customer_reviews.text: Fits great in my narrow hallway. We sit on it frequently to put shoes on and it feels very stable. The shelves underneath are a good size even for my ankle boots.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Function and Quality
customer_reviews.text: My son just wanted something by the door to put his shoes on. I surprised him with this and he lives the bench. It is very sturdy and looks great in his living room. Great price on it too.
customer_reviews.author: Sharrell Butler

customer_reviews.title: A sturdy bench!
customer_reviews.text: We had a problem with the screw holes not lining up for the shelves but the problem was efficiently taken care of with a replacement item sent within 2 days. Unbelievable service! The bench is very well made & the shoe shelves hold our shoes comfortably. The black padded seat is a good height & fits in our hallway wonderfully.
customer_reviews.author: Lois

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, functions well, and simple to build.
customer_reviews.text: Simple and easy to put together. Looks great, been up for a month and supports a 230-lb man quite well. Looked a little shaky or uneven when first put together, but in use it has been perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Dean Moriarty

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised how nice this is. It was super easy to assemble. It's also very comfortable and sturdy--doesn't wobble at all when I sit on it. Hold 7 pairs of size 12 men's shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Weedin

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble and good quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace other old shoe rack. What I like it most is that you can sit on it comfortably and wear shoes
customer_reviews.author: Charlie Chao

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: It was very easy to put together. My house looks very organize either my shoe bench! Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: shakeirra

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great value for money. It was easy to assemble. Perfect for many budgets
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Ward

product_meta.title: SONGMICS Shoe Bench, 3-Tier Shoe Rack for Entryway, Storage Organizer with Foam Padded Seat, Faux Leather, Metal Frame, for Living Room, Hallway, 31.9 x 12.2 x 19.3 Inches, Black ULBS58H
feature_bullets: Bench, Shoe Rack, Eye-catcher: In a classic black that could go with anything, this SONGMICS shoe bench is ready to support you as you lace up your shoes and raise a welcoming atmosphere in your entryway; now your guests won’t have to balance as they put on their shoes

Wobble? Fat Chance! Thanks to its compact and sturdy powder-coated iron frame, this well-padded bench can hold up to 440 lb (static load-bearing capacity) and is more resistant to wobbling, providing quality for the price
Comfort Is Not Lost: Though you won’t spend too long on the shoe bench, we still want to ensure you are comfortable every minute at home; that’s why this bench uses 2” foam padding and a PVC cover

It’s Working: Setup takes only a few simple steps, your shoes will no longer fling about but stay well-organized, and the 2 shelves hold up to 8 pairs of shoes. Your slippers can even find a place under the lower shelf!
100% SATISFACTION: SONGMICS provides professional customer service before and after your purchase; don't wait any longer and enjoy it now!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars1,195 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
specifications.Included Components: SONGMICS Metal Shoe Bench 2-Tier Shoe Rack Entryway Shoe Storage Organizer Faux Leather Top ULBS58H
